title: BFUHS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 05 Guest Faculty posts
description: Baba Farid University of Health Sciences (BFUHS) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 05 Guest Faculty Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.Pharm, M.Pharm, Pharm D can grab this chance and apply for these posts. Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for the BFUHS Recruitment 2025 . Interested and eligible candidates can attend the walk-in at the address gi...
